title: Main export partners of Germany 2017
summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Share in total exports in each Country on the y axis.
The Share in total exports is highest at Country United States and lowest at Country Switzerland.
There is a difference of 4.6 between the maximum Country United States and minimum Country Switzerland.
